ValidationRule.description: Users cannot approve or close HR record if locations is blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.Override_Validation_Rules__c = False, ISBLANK(Locations__c), OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Closed"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Approved") ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Locations must be filled out before continuing.
